<title level="1" pfs="">[Alak Stagram](/NPCs.aspx?ID=1531)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Humanoid](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=14)): DC 26

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 24

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 21
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 2">[Alak Stagram](/NPCs.aspx?ID=1531)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Unique" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=161" />
<trait label="LN" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Medium" />
<trait label="Human" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=90" />
<trait label="Humanoid" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=91" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Pathfinder #145: Hellknight Hill](/Sources.aspx?ID=4) pg. 19

**Perception** +7

**Languages**
[Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1), [Infernal](/Languages.aspx?ID=19), [Varisian](/Languages.aspx?ID=44)

**Skills**
[Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +8, [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=7) +4, [Religion](/Skills.aspx?ID=13) +5, [Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=14) +4

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +4

**Dex** +1

**Con** +3

**Int** +0

**Wis** +1

**Cha** +0
</row>

**Items**
[full plate armor](/Armor.aspx?ID=13), [Greatsword](/Weapons.aspx?ID=24), [Javelin](/Weapons.aspx?ID=71) (2)

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 20 

**Fort** +9 

**Ref** +7 

**Will** +5 

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**HP** 34

</row>

**[Attack of Opportunity](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=3)** <actions string="Reaction" /> 

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 20 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
greatsword +10 ([versatile P](/Traits.aspx?ID=200)),
**Damage** 1d12+4 slashing

**Ranged**
<actions string="Single Action" />
javelin +7 ([versatile P](/Traits.aspx?ID=200)),
**Damage** 1d6+4 piercing

**[Intimidating Strike](/Feats.aspx?ID=368)** <actions string="Two Actions" />  Your blow not only wounds creatures but also shatters their confidence. Make a melee Strike. If you hit and deal damage, the target is [frightened 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=19), or frightened 2 on a critical hit.

**[Power Attack](/Feats.aspx?ID=359)** <actions string="Two Actions" />  You unleash a particularly powerful attack that clobbers your foe but leaves you a bit unsteady. Make a melee Strike. This counts as two attacks when calculating your multiple attack penalty. If this Strike hits, you deal an extra die of weapon damage.

</column>
name: Alak Stagram

text: Alak Stagram Recall Knowledge - Humanoid (Society): DC 26 Unspecific Lore : DC 24 Specific Lore : DC 21 Alak Stagram Source Pathfinder #145: Hellknight Hill pg. 19 Perception +7 Languages Common, Infernal, Varisian Skills Athletics +8, Intimidation +4, Religion +5, Society +4 Str +4 Dex +1 Con +3 Int +0 Wis +1 Cha +0 Items full plate armor, Greatsword, Javelin (2) --- AC 20 Fort +9 Ref +7 Will +5 HP 34 Attack of Opportunity Reaction --- Speed 20 feet Melee Single Action greatsword +10 (versatile P), Damage 1d12+4 slashing Ranged Single Action javelin +7 (versatile P), Damage 1d6+4 piercing Intimidating Strike Two Actions Your blow not only wounds creatures but also shatters their confidence. Make a melee Strike. If you hit and deal damage, the target is frightened 1, or frightened 2 on a critical hit. Power Attack Two Actions You unleash a particularly powerful attack that clobbers your foe but leaves you a bit unsteady. Make a melee Strike. This counts as two attacks when calculating your multiple attack penalty. If this Strike hits, you deal an extra die of weapon damage.
